#summary Brief biographical notes and links for !PlazeCamp attendees.

Coming to !PlazeCamp?  Please add a brief biographical note, perhaps including some information about why you're attending and what your interest in Plazes is, to this page.

=== Peter Rukavina ===

[http://ruk.ca/ Weblog] | [mailto:peter@rukavina.net Email]

I'm a longtime Plazes user, and currently writing on the [http://blog.plazes.com Plazes weblog] as the ''Plazes User Advocate''.  I've been hacking together applications using various versions of the Plazes API for several years, and have [http://ruk.ca/w/index.php/Plazes a wiki page] where I've tried to document them all.
